Variable Documentation

W Creature

Creature class.

This class implements a prototype of simulated organic objects. (creature)

Parameters:
{Object} args extend/override constructor w/ this passed args object
Test:
default construction

Definition at line 15 of file Creature.js.

W Creature prototype clone

Initial value:

 function(){
  var clone = new W.Creature();
  for(var i in this){
    if(i != 'body' && i != 'img' && i != 'panel')
      eval('clone.'+ i +' = this["'+ i +'"];');
  }
  clone.msgQueue = [];
  this.ifWall = 'rturn';
  this.ifEnemy = 'attack,walk';
  return clone;
}
clone this creature and return the clone

Returns:
{Creature} creature the product of cloning
Test:
add creature with cloning

Definition at line 285 of file Creature.js.

W Creature prototype contact

Initial value:

 function(other){
  switch(this.dir){
    case 'north':
      switch(other.dir){
        case 'north': this.dir = 'south';  break;
        case 'east':  this.dir = 'west'; break;
        case 'west':  this.dir = 'east'; break;
      }; break;
    case 'south':
      switch(other.dir){
        case 'south': this.dir = 'north';  break;
        case 'east':  this.dir = 'west';  break;
        case 'west':  this.dir = 'east'; break;
      }; break;
    case 'east':
      switch(other.dir){
        case 'east': this.dir = 'west'; break;
        case 'north': this.dir = 'south'; break;
        case 'south':  this.dir = 'north';  break;
      }; break;
    case 'west':
      switch(other.dir){
        case 'west': this.dir = 'east'; break;
        case 'north': this.dir = 'south'; break;
        case 'south':  this.dir = 'north';  break;
      }; break;
  }
}
meet other creature

Parameters:
{Creature} other the creature this creature encountered
Note:
current implementation: turn back and walk away

W Creature prototype other

Initial value:

 function(other){
  this.wall();
  return;
}

Note:

 function(){

W Creature prototype reserveAct

Initial value:

 function(str){
  str = str?str:'walk';
  this.actQueue = str.split(',');
}
